job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Software Development Engineer , AWS IDEs
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The Amazon Web Services (AWS) IDE team provides developers with different tools and services that make it easy to develop modern cloud applications. We provide the IDE Toolkits for Eclipse, IntelliJ, Visual Studio, and Visual Studio Code. With AWS Cloud9, we also provide our customers with a Web-based IDE., * Learn and use modern and advanced technologies
     * Collaborate with internal engineering teams, leading technology companies around the world and the open source community
     * Develop cloud-based solutions that will delight software developers and system administrators globally
     * Create innovative products and see them launched in high volume production environments
     * Participate in on-call rotation

   A day in the life

   Work/Life Harmony: Our team gives high value to work-life harmony. Since the Covid19 pandemic we adjusted to remote work and established a hybrid work environment in which engineers spend 3 days working in the office, adjusted to the team needs.\

   Mentorship & Career Growth: We're committed to the growth and development of every member of the team, and that includes our development managers. As a senior software development engineer you will play a vital part in growing your peers. You will have the opportunity to contribute to the culture and direction and deliver site-wide initiatives that will improve the life of all of our teams. AWS is a growth environment - we are hiring and scaling rapidly to meet the needs of our customers. You'll have the opportunity to grow your scope of influence naturally as we scale and will have get to hire & develop other leaders along the way.

   On-Call Responsibility: This position involves On-call responsibility. We work as a team to root-cause the issues and ensure our systems are resilient and fault-tolerant.

   About the team

   You would work on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Next Gen DevX (NGDE) team where we are going to use generative AI and foundation models to reimagine the experience of all builders on AWS. From the IDE to web based tools and services AI will help engineers to work on large and small applications. In this team we have to explore new technologies and find creative solutions. Curiosity and an explorative mindset can find a place to impact the life of engineers around the world.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Development Engineer , AWS IDEs

The Amazon Web Services (AWS) IDE team provides developers with different tools and services that make it easy to develop modern cloud applications. We provide the IDE Toolkits for Eclipse, IntelliJ, Visual Studio, and Visual Studio Code. With AWS Cloud9, we also provide our customers with a Web-based IDE., * Learn and use modern and advanced technologies
     * Collaborate with internal engineering teams, leading technology companies around the world and the open source community
     * Develop cloud-based solutions that will delight software developers and system administrators globally
     * Create innovative products and see them launched in high volume production environments
     * Participate in on-call rotation

   A day in the life

   Work/Life Harmony: Our team gives high value to work-life harmony. Since the Covid19 pandemic we adjusted to remote work and established a hybrid work environment in which engineers spend 3 days working in the office, adjusted to the team needs.\

   Mentorship & Career Growth: We're committed to the growth and development of every member of the team, and that includes our development managers. As a senior software development engineer you will play a vital part in growing your peers. You will have the opportunity to contribute to the culture and direction and deliver site-wide initiatives that will improve the life of all of our teams. AWS is a growth environment - we are hiring and scaling rapidly to meet the needs of our customers. You'll have the opportunity to grow your scope of influence naturally as we scale and will have get to hire & develop other leaders along the way.

   On-Call Responsibility: This position involves On-call responsibility. We work as a team to root-cause the issues and ensure our systems are resilient and fault-tolerant.

   About the team

   You would work on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Next Gen DevX (NGDE) team where we are going to use generative AI and foundation models to reimagine the experience of all builders on AWS. From the IDE to web based tools and services AI will help engineers to work on large and small applications. In this team we have to explore new technologies and find creative solutions. Curiosity and an explorative mindset can find a place to impact the life of engineers around the world.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development within the AWS ecosystem, specifically for IDE tools. While it mentions 'generative AI and foundation models' as a future direction for the team, the core responsibilities and technologies described are not centered around building, fine-tuning, or deploying GenAI models themselves. Instead, it emphasizes developing cloud-based solutions, collaborating with engineering teams, and creating innovative products, which aligns more with a general software engineering role rather than a specialized GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves developing cloud-based solutions, creating innovative products, and working on IDE toolkits, which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop cloud-based solutions that will delight software developers and system administrators globally

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions creating innovative products and launching them in high-volume production environments, a typical software development lifecycle task.
job_tasks.phrase: Create innovative products and see them launched in high volume production environments

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'on-call rotation' and working as a team to 'root-cause the issues and ensure our systems are resilient and fault-tolerant' points to operational responsibilities for production systems.
Further elaborates on the on-call responsibility, focusing on system resilience and fault tolerance, which are operational concerns.
job_tasks.phrase: We work as a team to root-cause the issues and ensure our systems are resilient and fault-tolerant.

job_tasks.justification: The team's goal is to 'reimagine the experience of all builders on AWS' using generative AI, indicating a need to understand the business context of developer tools.
job_tasks.phrase: we are going to use generative AI and foundation models to reimagine the experience of all builders on AWS.

job_tasks.justification: While not the primary focus, the mention of using 'generative AI and foundation models' implies some level of interaction or application of these models, even if indirectly.
job_tasks.phrase: use generative AI and foundation models

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working on IDEs and web-based tools where AI will assist engineers, indicating software development to integrate AI capabilities.
job_tasks.phrase: From the IDE to web based tools and services AI will help engineers to work on large and small applications.

job_tasks.justification: The need to 'explore new technologies and find creative solutions' in the context of generative AI suggests an experimental and potentially modeling-related aspect.
job_tasks.phrase: explore new technologies and find creative solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Learn and use modern and advanced technologies' directly points to the need for continuous learning and adaptation.
job_tasks.phrase: Learn and use modern and advanced technologies

job_tasks.justification: The role requires collaboration with 'internal engineering teams, leading technology companies around the world and the open source community'.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with internal engineering teams, leading technology companies around the world and the open source community

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Create innovative products' highlights the expectation of innovation and taking ownership of product creation.
The mention of 'growing your peers' and 'contribute to the culture and direction' indicates a leadership and ownership role.
job_tasks.phrase: play a vital part in growing your peers

job_tasks.justification: The opportunity to 'hire & develop other leaders' signifies a strong element of ownership and leadership.
job_tasks.phrase: get to hire & develop other leaders along the way.

job_tasks.justification: The need to 'root-cause the issues' and ensure system resilience points to problem-solving skills.
The phrase 'Curiosity and an explorative mindset' directly relates to the ability to learn and adapt to new challenges.

soft_skills.phrase: Learn and use modern and advanced technologies
Collaborate with internal engineering teams, leading technology companies around the world and the open source community
play a vital part in growing your peers
get to hire & develop other leaders along the way.
